item.description:
This will be a thru-hike of about 4.75 miles and estimated moderate difficulty at this 5,730 acre state forest. This hike is after the shorter earlier hike this morning (makes a combined total of about 7 miles of hiking if you do both).

Please meet at 1 PM at the parking lot in the main entrance area which is in the general area of the pavilion, bathrooms, and boat launch onto Wallum Lake. The main entrance is off of Wallum Lake Rd. in Douglas, MA and you drive about 1 mile down the park road to the meetup location at the parking lot.

We will consolidate in as few cars as possible and relocate to the parking area north off of Rt. 16 (Webster St.). The hike will primarily be on a portion of the Midstate Trail southbound. Near the end, we'll take a small portion of the Coffeehouse Loop and the Cedar Swamp Trail (a boardwalk).

We should complete hiking by no later than 6 PM giving time to take an easy paced hike. Those who drove to the hike start location will need a lift from a well meaning soul to pick up our vehicles on Rt. 16. If anyone brings a picnic dinner they can eat lakeside. There is a beach and bathhouse so a swim might be possible too! :-) Optionally, if anyone beings a kayak they could kayak after the hike on the lake (I don't plan to myself at this time).

Approximate location/directions for meetup location via MapQuest, entrance to the state forest (107 Wallum Lake Rd., Douglas, MA -Remember you need to go about 1 mile into the forest on Wallum Lake Park Rd. to the parking area):
http://www.mapquest.c...
(Lat=42.034301, Long=-71.762935)

Directions from earlier hike at Purgatory Chasm to Douglas State Forest (about a 20 min. drive):
http://www.mapquest.c...

Directions (5 min. drive) from state forest entrance to hike start parking location (on Rt. 16/Webster St., Douglas, MA):
http://www.mapquest.c...

Trail map:
http://www.mass.gov/d...

Detail map near Wallum Lake:
http://www.mass.gov/d...

More about Douglas State Forest:
http://www.mass.gov/d...

A rough topographical map of the area about Douglas State Forest:
http://maps.google.co...

A generalized Midstate Trail map from southern border to northern border of MA:
http://www.mass.gov/d...

More about the 92 mile Midstate Trail:
http://www.midstatetr...

=== Legal Stuff ===
By clicking on "Yes" or "Maybe" for this event you agree, warrant, and covenant as follows:

In consideration for accepting this entry, I, the registrant, intending to be legally bound, hereby, for myself, my heirs, my executors and administrators, do waive and release any and all rights for damages I may have against any parties or persons connected with the Hartford Area Hiking meetup group for and related to the above listed event. I attest and verify that I am physically fit to participate in any portion of this above listed event. I grant Hartford Area Hiking permission to use any photographs, film or videotapes of this event for any purpose.
item.how_to_find_us: Dark green Dodge Caravan, CT plates. Meet at event location.

item.name: Hike at Douglas State Forest in Douglas MA
